code: @Manual{,   title = {omopViewer: What the Package Does (Title Case)},   author = {Who wrote it},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://oxford-pharmacoepi.github.io/omopViewer/}, }

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: goal omopViewer …

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: can install development version omopViewer GitHub :

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(omopViewer) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Create a Bootstrap Card with Collapsible Content for a Shiny Dashboard — createCard
title: Create a Bootstrap Card with Collapsible Content for a Shiny Dashboard — createCard
text: function generates Bootstrap card collapsible header content. content includes UI elements settings, filters, tables, optional extra UI element can displayed separate tab.

title: Create a Bootstrap Card with Collapsible Content for a Shiny Dashboard — createCard
code: createCard(id, title, setting_filter_ui, filter_ui, table_ui, extra_ui = NULL)

title: Create a Bootstrap Card with Collapsible Content for a Shiny Dashboard — createCard
text: id ID collapsible card element. title title displayed card header. setting_filter_ui UI element settings filter. filter_ui UI element filter. table_ui UI element table. extra_ui Optional UI element additional content, plot (default NULL).

title: Create a Bootstrap Card with Collapsible Content for a Shiny Dashboard — createCard
text: `div` element containing card structure use Shiny UI.

title: Create a Bootstrap Card with Collapsible Content for a Shiny Dashboard — createCard
code: if (FALSE) { createCard(   id = "example_card",   title = "Example Card",   setting_filter_ui = selectInput("setting", "Setting", choices = c("A", "B")),   filter_ui = selectInput("filter", "Filter", choices = c("X", "Y")),   table_ui = DT::dataTableOutput("example_table"),   extra_ui = plotOutput("example_plot") ) }

title: Generate a Dynamic Sidebar Menu for a Shiny Dashboard — sidebarMenuDynamic
Generate a Dynamic Sidebar Menu for a Shiny Dashboard — sidebarMenuDynamic
text: complete_data data frame containing complete data. columns named `variable_name`, `estimate_name`, `estimate_value`. incomplet_data list data frame containing incomplete data.

title: Generate a Dynamic Sidebar Menu for a Shiny Dashboard — sidebarMenuDynamic
text: `sidebarMenu` object Shiny dashboard.

title: Generate a Dynamic Sidebar Menu for a Shiny Dashboard — sidebarMenuDynamic
code: if (FALSE) { complete_data <- data.frame(   variable_name = c("settings", "settings", "other"),   estimate_name = c("result_type", "result_type", "other"),   estimate_value = c("table1", "table2", "other_value") )  incomplet_data <- list(table3 = data.frame(), table4 = data.frame())  sidebar <- sidebarMenuDynamic(complete_data, incomplet_data) }
